attributes.action: to appoint a non-profit making animal charity to be the sole provider of all food obtained from all animals and all products obtained from all animals which would prevent all factory farming and all intensive animal production methods from existing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An non-profit making animal charity should be employed to be the sole provider of all animals for food consumption and products obtained from all animals including all fish, poultry and bees; milk and wool etc. where any profits that are made are put back into the charity for the use of the charity. Which has the animals best interests at heart and are kind to the animals and provide the animals with their optimum-for the animals conditions. And which would prevent all factory farming and all intensive animal production methods from existing.
